description_txt: stated on August 5, 2016 in a posting on various websites:
quote_txt: Says in 2012 "Obama won in every state that did not require a photo ID and lost in every state that did require a photo ID in order to vote."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • August 9, 2016

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2016 in a tweet:
quote_txt: Says the media distorted what happened with a baby at his rally.

description_txt: stated on July 27, 2016 in an appearance on HBO's "Real Time with Bill Maher":
quote_txt: "We know this now. The banks no longer loan (Donald Trump) money because he's a terrible risk. So he goes to these (Russian) oligarchs and borrows money."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • August 8, 2016

description_txt: stated on July 26, 2016 in in a speech at the Democratic National Convention:
quote_txt: "Mike Pence voted against expanding the Children’s Health Insurance program, which Hillary helped to start."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2016 in a speech.:
quote_txt: Donald Trump says "all Mexicans are rapists."

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2016 in an interview on "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: "I haven't switched my position" on the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade deal.

description_txt: stated on August 7, 2016 in an ad played on "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: Through the Clinton Foundation, "the Clintons are now worth in excess of $100 million."

description_txt: stated on August 3, 2016 in a press release:
quote_txt: Says Barack Obama and Hillary Clinton are "responsible for leading America into a deal that will arm Iran."

description_txt: stated on July 17, 2016 in a conversation with The Buffalo News at the Republican National Convention.:
quote_txt: In Buffalo's SolarCity project, "Andrew Cuomo will create maybe 500 jobs if it ever happens at all, at about $1.5 million per job."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2016 in at the White House:
quote_txt: Because of the Trans-Pacific Partnership "we’ve got a country like Malaysia taking really serious efforts to crack down on human trafficking."

description_txt: stated on July 28, 2016 in a statement:
quote_txt: "Interior deportations under Obama were down 40 percent and at a nine-year low."

description_txt: stated on July 18, 2016 in a speech at the Republican National Convention.:
quote_txt: The Iran nuclear deal is "putting billions of dollars back into a country that’s the world’s largest supporter of terrorism. We are actually giving them the money to fund the terrorists that are killing us and our allies."

description_txt: stated on August 3, 2016 in a rally in Daytona Beach, Fla.:
quote_txt: Says he saw videotape "of the people taking the money off the plane" to pay ransom to Iran for hostages.

description_txt: stated on August 3, 2016 in a White House press briefing:
quote_txt: "The mosquito population in South Florida is larger than it is in many other communities in the country."

description_txt: stated on August 4, 2016 in a campaign video :
quote_txt: "Hillary Clinton says she wants to, ‘raise taxes on the middle class.’ "

description_txt: stated on July 12, 2016 in a No on Prop. 64 campaign press release. :
quote_txt: California’s marijuana legalization initiative, Prop. 64 "allows marijuana smoking ads in prime time, on programs with millions of children and teenage viewers."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2016 in an interview with the Washington Post:
quote_txt: "I’m beating (Kelly Ayotte) in the polls by a lot."

description_txt: stated on July 18, 2016 in a speech:
quote_txt: "The poverty rates in America today aren’t much better than when we started the War on Poverty."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2016 in a press conference at the White House:
quote_txt: Thanks to the Trans-Pacific Partnership, "Vietnam is drafting and presenting unprecedented labor reforms, changing their Constitution to recognize worker organizations in Vietnam for the first time."

description_txt: stated on August 3, 2016 in an op-ed:
quote_txt: After initially agreeing with Republicans on an amount for Zika funding, "Democrats derailed it."

description_txt: stated on July 18, 2016 in a Republican National Convention video:
quote_txt: In Arizona, "there are only one and a half (Border Patrol) agents per every 10 square miles."

description_txt: stated on July 27, 2016 in a Reddit Ask Me Anything:
quote_txt: "Youth unemployment is through the roof."

description_txt: stated on July 20, 2016 in a press release :
quote_txt: "Illinois suffered 1,652 overdose deaths in 2014 ... of which 40 percent were associated with heroin. Illinois is ranked number one in the nation for a decline in treatment capacity between 2007 and 2012, and is now ranked the third worst in the country for state-funded treatment capacity."

description_txt: stated on August 2, 2016 in a White House press conference:
quote_txt: The Trans-Pacific Partnership "knocks out 18,000 tariffs that other countries place on American products and goods."

description_txt: stated on May 31, 2016 in a Facebook post:
quote_txt: "Then, the Republican leader theatrically introduced new bills with stopgap budget language, declaring that we could stay until midnight and pass this compromise. Except under our constitution, a bill has to be read on 3 different days, so that's not possible."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2016 in a rally in Columbus, Ohio:
quote_txt: Russia and China are "doing naval exercises together someplace."

description_txt: stated on August 1, 2016 in a campaign ad:
quote_txt: Says "Marco Rubio didn’t show up" for a vote on his own bill on sanctions against Hezbollah.

description_txt: stated on July 20, 2016 in a press release.:
quote_txt: Says "Danny Tarkanian … wants to defund Planned Parenthood and would outlaw a woman's right to choose, even in cases of rape or incest."

description_txt: stated on July 20, 2016 in a radio ad:
quote_txt: Says Milwaukee County district attorney candidate Verona Swanigan "has worked as a prosecutor."

description_txt: stated on July 29, 2016 in a rally speech:
quote_txt: "We have a fire marshal that said, 'Oh we can't allow more people’ ...  And the reason they won't let them in is because they don't know what the hell they're doing."
